title: "Global Automated Machine Learning Market Report 2023: Surge in Application of Satellite Imagery in Various Sectors Bolsters Growth"
excerpt: "In 2022, the automated machine learning market size stood at USD 631 million, which is projected to witness a 49.2% CAGR during 2022-2030, reaching USD 15,499.3 million by 2030 as per the report. The major factors accountable for the development of the market include the growing demand for effective fraud-finding solutions and the rising need for personalized product recommendations."
